articles.author: Ashutosh Joshi
articles.title: India Overtakes Hong Kong as World's Fourth-Largest Stock Market - Bloomberg
articles.description: India’s stock market capitalization has overtaken Hong Kong’s for the first time as the South Asian nation’s growth prospects and policy reforms make it an investor darling while global capital pours out of China.
